57 Leaf Clover.desc: All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for a favorable outcome.

Aegis.desc: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier for 50% (+50% per stack) of the amount you healed.
Aegis.quote: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier.

Alien Head.desc: Reduce skill cooldowns by 25% (+25% per stack).

Armor-Piercing Rounds.desc: Deal an additional 20% damage (+20% per stack) to bosses.

AtG Missile Mk. 1.desc: 10% chance to fire a missile that deals 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage.

Backup Magazine.desc: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Secondary skill.
Backup Magazine.quote: Add an extra charge of your Secondary skill.

Bandolier.desc: 18% (+10% per stack) chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.
Bandolier.quote: Chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.

Berzerker's Pauldron.desc: Killing 3 enemies within 1 second sends you into a frenzy for 6s (+4s per stack). Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.
Berzerker's Pauldron.quote: Enter a frenzy after killing 3 enemies in quick succession.

Brainstalks.desc: Upon killing an elite monster, enter a frenzy for 4s (+4s per stack) where skills have no cooldowns.
Brainstalks.quote: Skills have NO cooldowns for a short period after killing an elite.

Brilliant Behemoth.desc: All your attacks explode in a 4m (+2.5m per stack) radius for a bonus 60% TOTAL damage to nearby enemies.

Brittle Crown.desc: 30% chance on hit to gain 2 gold (+2 per stack). Scales over time. Lose gold on taking damage equal to 100% (+100% per stack) of the maximum health percentage you lost.
Brittle Crown.quote: Gain gold on hit... BUT lose gold on getting hit.

Bundle of Fireworks.desc: Activating an interactable launches 8 (+4 per stack) fireworks that deal 300% base damage.
Bundle of Fireworks.quote: Activating an interactable launches fireworks at nearby enemies.

Bustling Fungus.desc: After standing still for 2 seconds, create a zone that heals for 4.5% (+2.25% per stack) of your health every second to all allies within 3m (+1.5m per stack).
Bustling Fungus.quote: Heal all nearby allies after standing still for 2 seconds.

Cautious Slug.desc: Increases passive health regeneration by 3 hp/s (+3 hp/s per stack) while outside of combat.

Ceremonial Dagger.desc: Killing an enemy fires out 3 homing daggers that deal 150% (+150% per stack) base damage.
Ceremonial Dagger.quote: Killing an enemy releases homing daggers.

Chronobauble.desc: Slow enemies on hit for -60% movement speed for 2s (+2s per stack).

Corpsebloom.desc: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more. All healing is applied over time. Can heal for a maximum of 10% (reduced by 50% per stack) of your health per second.
Corpsebloom.quote: Double your healing... BUT it's applied over time.

Crowbar.desc: Deal 150% (+50% per stack) damage to enemies above 90% health.
Crowbar.quote: Deal more damage to healthy enemies.

Dio's Best Friend.desc: Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability.

Energy Drink.desc: Sprint speed is improved by 30% (+20% per stack).

Focus Crystal.desc: Increase damage to enemies within 13m by 15% (+15% per stack).
Focus Crystal.quote: Deal bonus damage to nearby enemies.

Fresh Meat.desc: Increases base health regeneration by +2 hp/s for 3s (+3s per stack) after killing an enemy.
Fresh Meat.quote: Regenerate health after killing an enemy.

Frost Relic.desc: Killing an enemy surrounds you with an ice storm that deals 600% damage per second. The storm grows with every kill, increasing its radius by 1m. Stacks up to 6m (+6m per stack).
Frost Relic.quote: Killing enemies surrounds you with an ice storm.

Fuel Cell.desc: Hold an additional equipment charge (+1 per stack). Reduce equipment cooldown by 15% (+15% per stack).
Fuel Cell.quote: Hold an additional equipment charge. Reduce equipment cooldown.

Gasoline.desc: Killing an enemy ignites all enemies within 12m (+4m per stack). Enemies burn for 150% (+75% per stack) base damage.
Gasoline.quote: Killing enemies sets nearby enemies on fire.

Genesis Loop.desc: Falling below 25% health causes you to explode, dealing 6000% base damage. Recharges every 30 seconds (-50% per stack).
Genesis Loop.quote: Fire an electric nova at low health.

Gesture of the Drowned.desc: Reduce Equipment cooldown by 50% (+15% per stack). Forces your Equipment to activate whenever it is off cooldown.
Gesture of the Drowned.quote: Dramatically reduce Equipment cooldown... BUT it automatically activates.

Ghor's Tome.desc: 4% (+4% on stack) chance on kill to drop a treasure worth $25. Scales over time.
Ghor's Tome.quote: Chance on kill to drop a treasure.

H3AD-5T v2.desc: Increase jump height. Creates a 10m radius kinetic explosion on hitting the ground, dealing 2300% base damage that scales up with speed. Recharges in 10 (-50% per stack) seconds.
H3AD-5T v2.quote: Increase jump height. Hold 'Use' to slam down to the ground.

Halcyon Seed.desc: Summon Aurelionite during the teleporter event. It has 100% (+50% per stack) damage and 100% (+100% per stack) health.
Halcyon Seed.quote: Summon Aurelionite during the Teleporter event.

Happiest Mask.desc: Killing enemies has a 7% chance to spawn a ghost of the killed enemy with 1500% damage. Lasts 30s (+30s per stack).
Happiest Mask.quote: Chance on killing an enemy to summon a ghost.

Hardlight Afterburner.desc: Add +2 (+2 per stack) charges of your Utility skill. Reduces Utility skill cooldown by 33%.
Hardlight Afterburner.quote: Add 2 extra charges of your Utility skill. Reduce Utility skill cooldown.

Harvester's Scythe.desc: Gain 5% critical chance (+0% per stack). Critical strikes heal for 8 (+4 per stack) health.

Hopoo Feather.desc: Gain +1 (+1 per stack) maximum jump count.

Infusion.desc: Killing an enemy increases your health permanently by 1, up to a maximum of 100 (+100 per stack) health.
Infusion.quote: Killing an enemy permanently increases your health, up to 100.

Irradiant Pearl.desc: Increases ALL stats by 10% (+10% per stack).

Kjaro's Band.desc: 8% chance on hit to strike an enemy with a runic flame tornado, dealing 500% (+250% per stack) TOTAL damage.
Kjaro's Band.quote: Chance on hit to strike an enemy with a runic flame tornado.

Leeching Seed.desc: Dealing damage heals you for 1 (+1 per stack) health.

Lens-Maker's Glasses.desc: Your attacks have a 10% (+10% per stack) chance to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.
Lens-Maker's Glasses.quote: Chance to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.

Lepton Daisy.desc: Release a healing nova during the Teleporter event, healing all nearby allies for 50% of their maximum health. Occurs 1 (+1 per stack) times.
Lepton Daisy.quote: Periodically release a healing nova during the Teleporter event.

Little Disciple.desc: Fire a tracking wisp for 100% (+100% per stack) damage. Fires every 0.5 seconds while sprinting.

Medkit.desc: Heal for 10 (+10 per stack) health 1.1 seconds after getting hurt.
Medkit.quote: Receive a delayed heal after taking damage.

Monster Tooth.desc: Killing an enemy spawns a healing orb that heals for 8 (+8 per stack) health.
Monster Tooth.quote: Drop a healing orb on kill.

N'kuhana's Opinion.desc: Store 100% (+100% per stack) of healing as Soul Energy. After your Soul Energy reaches 10% of your maximum health, fire a skull that deals 250% of your Soul Energy as damage.

Old Guillotine.desc: Instantly kill Elite monsters below 20% (+20% per stack) health.
Old Guillotine.quote: Instantly kill low health Elite monsters.

Old War Stealthkit.desc: Chance on taking damage to gain 40% movement speed and invisibility for 3s (+1.5s per stack). Chance increases the more damage you take.
Old War Stealthkit.quote: Turn invisible on taking heavy damage.

Paul's Goat Hoof.desc: Increases movement speed by 14% (+14% per stack).

Pearl.desc: Increases maximum health by 10% (+10% per stack).

Personal Shield Generator.desc: Gain a shield equal to 8% (+8% per stack) of your maximum health. Recharges outside of danger.

Predatory Instincts.desc: Gain 5% critical chance (+0% per stack). Critical strikes increase attack speed by 12%. Maximum cap of 36% (+24% per stack) attack speed.
Predatory Instincts.quote: 'Critical Strikes' increase attack speed. Stacks 3 times.

Queen's Gland.desc: Every 30 seconds, summon a Beetle Guard with bonus 300% damage and 100% health. Can have up to 1 (+1 per stack) Guards at a time.

Razorwire.desc: Getting hit causes you to explode in a burst of razors, dealing 160% damage. Hits up to 5 (+2 per stack) targets in a 25m (+10m per stack) radius
Razorwire.quote: Retaliate in a burst of razors on taking damage.

Red Whip.desc: Leaving combat boosts your movement speed by 30% (+30% per stack).

Resonance Disc.desc: Killing enemies charges the Resonance Disc. The disc launches itself toward a target for 300% base damage (+300% per stack), piercing all enemies it doesn't kill, and then explodes for 1000% base damage (+1000% per stack). Returns to the user, striking all enemies along the way for 300% base damage (+300% per stack).
Resonance Disc.quote: Obtain a Resonance Disc charged by killing enemies. Fires automatically when fully charged.

Rose Buckler.desc: Increase armor by 30 (+30 per stack) while sprinting.

Runald's Band.desc: 8% chance on hit to strike an enemy with a runic ice blast, slowing them by 80% and dealing 250% (+125% per stack) TOTAL damage.
Runald's Band.quote: Chance on hit to strike an enemy with a runic ice blast.

Rusted Key.desc: A hidden cache containing an item will appear in a random location on each stage. (Increases rarity of the item per stack).
Rusted Key.quote: Gain access to a Rusty Lockbox that contains treasure.

Sentient Meat Hook.desc: 20% (+20% per stack) chance on hit to fire homing hooks at up to 10 (+5 per stack) enemies for 100% TOTAL damage.
Sentient Meat Hook.quote: Chance to hook all nearby enemies.

Shaped Glass.desc: Increase base damage by 100% (+100% per stack). Reduce maximum health by 50% (+50% per stack).
Shaped Glass.quote: Double your damage... BUT halve your health.

Shattering Justice.desc: After hitting an enemy 5 times, reduce their armor by 60 for 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.
Shattering Justice.quote: Reduce the armor of enemies after repeatedly striking them.

Soldier's Syringe.desc: Increases attack speed by 15% (+15% per stack).

Soulbound Catalyst.desc: Kills reduce equipment cooldown by 4s (+2s per stack).

Sticky Bomb.desc: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to attach a bomb to an enemy, detonating for 180% TOTAL damage.
Sticky Bomb.quote: Chance on hit to attach a bomb to enemies.

Strides of Heresy.desc: Replace your Utility Skill with Shadowfade. Fade away, becoming intangible and gaining +30% movement speed. Heal for 25% (+25% per stack) of your maximum health. Lasts 3 (+3 per stack) seconds.

Stun Grenade.desc: 5% (+5% on stack) chance on hit to stun enemies for 2 seconds.

Titanic Knurl.desc: Increase maximum health by 40 (+40 per stack) and health regeneration by 1.6 (+1.6 per stack) health / second.

Tonic Affliction.quote: Reduce ALL stats when not under the effects of Spinel Tonic.

Topaz Brooch.desc: Gain a temporary barrier on kill for 15 health (+15 per stack).
Topaz Brooch.quote: Gain a temporary barrier on kill.

Tougher Times.desc: 15% (+15% per stack) chance to block incoming damage. Unaffected by luck.

Transcendence.desc: Convert all but 1 health into regenerating shields. Gain 50% (+25% per stack) maximum health.
Transcendence.quote: Convert all your health into shield. Increase maximum health.

Tri-Tip Dagger.desc: 15% (+15% per stack) chance to bleed an enemy for 240% base damage.
Tri-Tip Dagger.quote: Chance to bleed enemies on hit.

Ukulele.desc: 25% chance to fire chain lighting for 80% TOTAL damage on up to 3 (+2 per stack) targets within 20m (+2m per stack).

Unstable Tesla Coil.desc: Fire out lightning that hits 3 (+2 per stack) enemies for 200% base damage every 0.5s. The Tesla Coil switches off every 10 seconds.
Unstable Tesla Coil.quote: Shock all nearby enemies every 10 seconds.

Visions of Heresy.desc: Replace your Primary Skill with Hungering Gaze. Fire a flurry of tracking shards that detonate after a delay, dealing 120% base damage. Hold up to 12 charges (+12 per stack) that reload after 2 seconds (+2 per stack).
Visions of Heresy.quote: Replace your Primary Skill with 'Hungering Gaze'.

Wake of Vultures.desc: Gain the power of any killed elite monster for 8s (+5s per stack).
Wake of Vultures.quote: Temporarily steal the power of slain elites.

War Horn.desc: Activating your Equipment gives you +70% attack speed for 8s (+4s per stack).
War Horn.quote: Activating your Equipment gives you a burst of attack speed.

Warbanner.desc: On level up drop a banner that strengthens all allies within 16m (+8m per stack). Raise attack and movement speed by 30%.
Warbanner.quote: Drop a Warbanner on leveling up, giving you great strength.

Wax Quail.desc: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward by 10m (+10m per stack).
Wax Quail.quote: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward.

Will-o'-the-wisp.desc: On killing an enemy, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius for 350% (+280% per stack) base damage.
